messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: The disheveled crime scene caught the immediate attention of Detective Maria Lyon and Sergeant Wilson Tanner. Both were met on scene by Lieutenant Hopper, who had prior knowledge of a similar occurrence in the neighboring district. Captain Flint authorized a citywide alert after cross-referencing this incident with others. On technical aspects, Criminalist Neil, along with Technician Leslie, were responsible for gathering and analyzing micro-fibers found at the site. In a twist of events, Patrol Officer Elroy found a wallet which led to the identification of a prime suspect. Deputy Rawls assisted with managing the perimeter while Coroner Dr. Ingrid made a preliminary assessment of the victim. Nearby, Officer Lyle and Detective Archer interacted with local witnesses, gathering a series of inconsistent statements. DOCUMENT INSPECTION carried out under the authority of Westbrook police unit. REFERENCE ID: 89021 - Timestamp: 5:15 AM. Initial findings were reviewed by Sergeant Rebecca, who raised certain procedural concerns.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Detective Maria Lyon Officer Context: Noted the crime scene immediately upon arrival. Officer Role: Detective  Officer Name: Sergeant Wilson Tanner Officer Context: Arrived at the crime scene with Detective Maria Lyon. Officer Role: Sergeant  Officer Name: Lieutenant Hopper Officer Context: Met Detective Maria Lyon and Sergeant Wilson Tanner on scene, had prior knowledge of a similar event. Officer Role: Lieutenant  Officer Name: Captain Flint Officer Context: Authorized a citywide alert post cross-referencing the incident. Officer Role: Captain  Officer Name: Criminalist Neil Officer Context: Tasked with gathering and analyzing micro-fibers from the crime site. Officer Role: Criminalist  Officer Name: Technician Leslie Officer Context: Assisted Criminalist Neil in evidence collection and analysis. Officer Role: Technician  Officer Name: Patrol Officer Elroy Officer Context: Found a wallet that aided in identifying a main suspect. Officer Role: Patrol Officer  Officer Name: Deputy Rawls Officer Context: Assisted in maintaining the perimeter of the crime scene. Officer Role: Deputy  Officer Name: Dr. Ingrid Officer Context: Performed an initial assessment of the victim. Officer Role: Coroner  Officer Name: Officer Lyle Officer Context: Engaged with local witnesses alongside Detective Archer. Officer Role: Officer  Officer Name: Detective Archer Officer Context: Interacted with local witnesses and gathered various statements. Officer Role: Detective  Officer Name: Sergeant Rebecca Officer Context: Reviewed initial findings and pointed out procedural concerns. Officer Role: Sergeant
